events.name: San Diego State Aztecs at UNLV Rebels

headlines.description: — Lucas Johnson completed 18 of 24 pass attempts for 192 yards and threw three touchdowns, and No. 23 San Diego State survived a scare to beat UNLV 28-20 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 23 San Diego State holds off UNLV, 28-20

video.headline: San Diego State seals it with TD late in 4th

headlines.description: — Clayton Tune threw for 264 yards and a touchdown and ran for another score as No. 17 Houston extended its winning streak to 10 games with a 31-13 victory over Memphis on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tune has TDs passing, rushing, No. 17 Houston beats Memphis

video.headline: Houston handles Memphis for 10th win of the season

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Memphis Tigers vs. Houston Cougars: Full Highlights) 2021/11/20 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Southern Miss Golden Eagles at Louisiana Tech Bulldogs

headlines.description: — Frank Gore Jr. threw two touchdowns on four completions and Southern Mississippi beat Louisiana Tech 35-19 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gore accounts for 3TDs to send S. Miss past Louisiana Tech

video.headline: Frank Gore Jr. airs it out for beautiful 39-yard TD strike

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Frank Gore Jr. with 39-yard touchdown Pass to Jason Brownlee vs. Louisiana Tech) 2021/11/20 ESHEET

events.name: Arizona Wildcats at Washington State Cougars

headlines.description: — Max Borghi rushed for a career-high 139 yards and two touchdowns in the last home game of his career, Travell Harris and Calvin Jackson Jr. each had two touchdown receptions, and Washington State became bowl eligible with a 44-18 win over Arizona on...
headlines.shortLinkText: Washington State bowl eligible after thumping Arizona 44-18

video.headline: Washington State becomes bowl eligible after big win vs. Arizona

events.name: Air Force Falcons at Nevada Wolf Pack

headlines.shortLinkText: Hughes, Air Force beat Nevada 41-39 in 3OT
